content: {"name": "Burlington County Board of Social Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/\nWe can help you provide nutritious meals for your family. SNAP, formerly Food Stamps, provides nutritious meals to low-income families. To apply or for more information, call our Service Representative at (609) 518-4839 or (800) 342-0047 ext. 4839.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.bcbss.org/dir/dir-main-english.htm", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "795 Woodlane Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Mount Holly", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08060", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0105813, "longitude": -74.7933328}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 518-4839 or (800) 342-0047 ext. 4839", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}]}
